comments:
Build 20020313

Define the following source unit, and open it in editor (with temporary 
problems on).

[package p1;

public class T {

	void foo(){
		System.out.println("
		
	}
	
}]

put the cursor behind the '"', and press <ENTER>, you'll see the
following stack trace:
